ExportToExcel
ExportToExcel
. Export to Excel
Purpose
. Automatic upload of the reporting form to Excel
Syntax
depends on the object uploaded:
Parameters:
Report [
RF_REPORT
]/ data source [
RF_SOURCE
];
Select an object and specify which object is used to generate the document.
The Report/ data source parameters are inherited automatically from the object to be defined in the algorithm. If the object contains no parameters, the field will remain empty.
As a result of executing the function, a file is generated â€“ the object type [
FS_FILE
] in
XLSX
. File generation is similar to manual uploading to excel with saving all the settings of the reporting form (such as filtering, styling, grouping, etc.).
